I write a blog about war and disease.

I am a pacifist with very narrow exceptions for self defence, and I am still angry that we let the pandemic become a forever problem.

I live in one of the healthiest and most peaceful places on Earth – somewhere in the Western Pacific region – but my country is only the "least bad". We need to be a far less selfish and less greedy nation. We need to shun our current murderous so-called allies, and be a much more generous to our neighbours.

Personally I am an atheist, but I believe that religion is usually more beneficial than harmful. I hold religion to the same standards as any other ideology.
